Demographic data analyzer

title:

Demographic data analyzer

descrip.

Medical data visualizer

title:

Medical data visualizer

descrip.

A medical data visualizer to explore the relationship between cardiac disease, body measurements, blood markers, and lifestyle choices.

JupiterLab

Pageview time series visualizer

title:

Pageview time series visualizer

descrip.

A Pageview time series visualizer using Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn to visualize the number of daily page views of the forum section in freeCodeCamp.org.
